FuncDef: This command selects the owner protocol of the inclusive PMSI tunnel in the service. Only one of the protocols will support the provider tunnel.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies that bgp-ad is the owner of the provider-tunnel.
Specifies that bgp-vpls is the owner of the provider-tunnel.
Specifies that bgp-evpn-mpls is the owner of the provider-tunnel.
